root.name: Samantha Swift and the Hidden Roses of Athena
root.description: OverviewSamantha Swift and the Hidden Roses of Athena is a hidden object game developed and published by MumboJumbo for the Nintendo DS and PC platforms.Compilation ReleaseOn October 30th, 2010 Samantha Swift and the Hidden Roses of Athena was released in a compilation pack along with Nancy Drew Message in a Haunted Mansion on the PC. The two pack was published by MumboJumbo under the Premium Casual Games line and was titled the Mystery Adventure 2-Pack.

similar_games.game: James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Death in Scarlet
